sect1.title: Errata
sect1.para: The software used to create BLFS applications is constantly being updated and enhanced. Security warnings and bug fixes may become available after the BLFS book has been released. To check whether the package versions or instructions in this release of BLFS need any modifications to accommodate security vulnerabilities or other bug fixes, please visit before proceeding with your build. You should note any changes shown and apply them to the relevant section of the book as you progress with building the applications in BLFS.
